name: Deep Trading Simulator v16 (Final)
description: A grand strategy/tycoon simulator where the player evolves from a simple trader to a global economic and political powerhouse. The game features a sophisticated simulation engine with interconnected global factors and asset DNAs, a full suite of trading mechanics including spot and margin trading, an entrepreneurship module for building a corporate empire, and a political influence system. This final version includes 12 world powers, over 40 tradable assets, a dynamic news system, and full support for English and Persian (RTL).
